Our Tax & Accounting Services

Comprehensive financial services tailored to individuals and businesses operating in Canada, the United States, or both.

üåê

Cross-Border Tax Services

Expert Canada-US cross-border tax preparation and planning for individuals and businesses operating in both countries.

Navigating the complexities of cross-border taxation between Canada and the United States requires specialized expertise. At Hills Tax, our cross-border tax specialists handle dual filing obligations, treaty benefits, foreign tax credits, and compliance with both the IRS and CRA.

  • Dual Canada-US tax return preparation
  • Treaty benefit optimization
  • Foreign tax credit maximization
  • FBAR and FATCA compliance
  • Streamlined filing procedures
  • Cross-border business structuring
  • Expatriate tax planning
  • Renunciation tax planning
Learn More About Cross-Border Tax

Personal Tax Preparation

Comprehensive personal tax preparation services to maximize your refund and ensure CRA compliance.

Our personal tax preparation services go beyond simple filing. We take the time to understand your complete financial picture ‚Äî employment income, investments, rental properties, and more ‚Äî to identify every eligible deduction and credit.

  • T1 personal tax return preparation
  • Investment income reporting (T3, T5)
  • Rental property income and deductions
  • Self-employment income (T2125)
  • Medical expense optimization
  • RRSP and TFSA planning
  • Prior year and amended returns
  • CRA audit representation
üè¢

Corporate Tax

Strategic corporate tax preparation and planning to minimize your business tax liability.

Our corporate tax services are designed to help businesses of all sizes meet their tax obligations while taking advantage of every available deduction and incentive. From T2 corporate returns to SR&ED credits, we provide comprehensive corporate tax solutions.

  • T2 corporate tax return preparation
  • Small business deduction optimization
  • SR&ED tax credit claims
  • HST/GST filing and compliance
  • Payroll tax management
  • Corporate restructuring advice
  • Year-end tax planning
  • CRA correspondence and audits
üìä

Tax Planning

Proactive tax planning strategies to minimize your tax burden and maximize wealth retention.

Effective tax planning is about looking ahead, not just filing returns. Our tax planning services help individuals and businesses develop strategies to minimize current and future tax liabilities.

  • Year-round tax strategy development
  • Income splitting strategies
  • Retirement planning optimization
  • Estate and succession planning
  • Investment tax efficiency
  • Business structure optimization
  • Capital gains planning
  • Charitable giving strategies
üõ°Ô∏è

IRS & CRA Compliance

Full compliance services for both IRS and CRA requirements, including audit representation.

Staying compliant with both the IRS and CRA can be challenging, especially for cross-border filers. Our compliance services ensure you meet all filing obligations, deadlines, and reporting requirements.

  • Voluntary disclosure programs
  • Audit representation (CRA & IRS)
  • Unfiled tax return preparation
  • Penalty and interest relief requests
  • FBAR and FATCA reporting
  • Trust and estate compliance
  • Non-resident tax compliance
  • Taxpayer relief applications
